alert.note: Alert for Butler (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BUTLER COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Zelienople, or 8 miles north of Cranberry, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Butler, Homeacre-Lyndora, Shanor-Northvue, Meridian, Zelienople, Meadowood, Oak Hills, Evans City, Nixon, Prospect, Harmony, East Butler, Connoquenessing, Callery, West Liberty, Portersville, and Moraine State Park. This includes Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 84 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
